meanings.sent2: The fresh fruits were very eatable.
meanings.sent3: The cookies were so eatable that they disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The picnic spread was a feast of eatable delights.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the barbecue was so enticing, making everything seem more eatable.

meanings.sent1: The ripe apples were definitely eatable.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich was not very eatable after being left out for hours.
meanings.sent3: The dog found the leftovers quite eatable and finished them in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The fish was so fresh that it looked almost too eatable to resist.
meanings.sent5: The chocolate was so tempting and eatable that it was hard to resist taking a bite.
